eyath wadagath charithrayak.samahara aya thamanta kamathi pramanayak beda eelanga bhikshun wahanseta danaya piliganwimata yanawa sudulunu bik ekak ho dekak beda ethanin iwathwanawa.me siyalla niyamitha charithrayan bawa apa therum gatha yuthu wanawa.danaya sandaha piliyela karagath aaharapana wyanjana bhikshun wahanseta manawa penena paridi peliyata gena yama niwaradi kramayayi.esema dayakayan dan piliganwanne manawa therum gatha yuthu wadagath karunak thibenawa.
hoyala hoyala ara hine diha balagena marila yanawa.
